text: When a blank page must be added to follow the force-page-count constraint, and a page-sequence-master has been defined for the last page, that page-sequence-master will be used for the next-to-last page instead, and the last page will be a blank page.
creator: vhennebert@gmail.com
vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 24838
First example. Blank page is added after last page instead of using normal p-s-m for page 2 and last-page for page 3

creator: vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 24839

Created attachment 24840
Second example. Last-page too small to hold content, so added as page 3 and blank page as page 4
